original_text: Then in the morning, when Nabal was sober, his wife told him all these things, and his heart failed him and he became like a stone.
korean_text: 아침에 나발이 포도주에서 깬 후에 그의 아내가 그에게 이 일을 말하매 그가 낙담하여 몸이 돌과 같이 되었더니

sentences.original_text: his wife told him all these things
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 아내가 그에게 이 모든 일을 말해주었다

sentences.original_text: and he became like a stone
